name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 8 years of experience, I excel in designing and implementing sophisticated software solutions anchored in **Laravel**, **React**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **PHP**, **MySQL**, and modern frontend technologies. My proficiency in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD processes enables efficient deployment and scaling of applications. I bring a solid understanding of **TDD** and Agile methodologies to promote high-quality code and rapid iteration. Additionally, I leverage strong analytical skills, critical thinking, and excellent communication abilities to enhance user experience and foster effective teamwork. Building on my expertise in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), **AWS**, and database optimization, I deliver high-performance applications specifically tailored to the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors.
